summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to relocation assistance for emergency orders, amending SMC Section 22.200.020 relating to the intent of the Code regarding relocation assistance payments; amending SMC Section 22.202.050 relating to fines and penalties deposited in the Housing and Abatement Account; adding a new SMC Section 22.202.060 to establish an account for the payment of emergency relocation assistance; amending SMC Section 22.206.260 to provide for annual adjustment to the amount of relocation assistance for emergency orders; adding a new SMC Section 22.206.265 to establish procedures for paying relocation assistance for emergency orders; amending SMC Section 22.206.280 to increase the penalty when a property owner fails to pay relocation assistance for an emergency order; and adding a new SMC Section 22.206.295 providing a private right of action for tenants.
